payment_invite: payment_invite (random_key TEXT DEFAULT (lower(hex(randomblob(10)))) PRIMARY KEY, data_json TEXT, create_dt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
pyment_log: pyment_log (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, data_json TEXT, create_dt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
payment_need_pay: payment_need_pay (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, hash TEXT, data_json TEXT, create_dt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
